text: Harkishan Singh Surjeet (23 March 1916 – 1 August 2008) was a communist politician from Punjab, India. He was the General Secretary of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) from 1992 to 2005 and was a member of the party's Political Bureau from 1964 to 2008."Nine to none, founders’ era ends in CPM", The Telegraph (Calcutta), April 3, 2008. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:Politicians from Punjab, India
title: Harkishan Singh Surjeet
